mAqruqtama#si maqrutAqmOjOq&pAM dhArA$M Bindhi raqmaya#ta marutaH SyEqnamAqyinaqM manO#java saqM ~MvRuSha#Na(gm) suvRuqktiM || 
yEnaq Sarddha# uqgramava#-sRuShTaqmEtiq tada#SvinAq pari# dhatta(gg) svaqsti |

staqnayaqn var.Sha#n BIqmarAqvathsvAhA# &naSaqnya#vaqsPUrja#n-diqdyud-var.Sha#n-tvEqSharAqvRuth svAhA# &tirAqtraqM ~Mvar.Sha#n pUqrtirAqvRuth - [  ]  19
